1.9.name: wordpress/quick-adsense-cn
1.9.description:
Chinese: 一个不错的广告位管理插件，你可以很方便的添加删除管理您的博客广告，Joychao汉化
如有问题请联系： QQ:44294631
Url:http://www.joychao.cc
Email:Joy@joychao.cc,44294631@qq.com
Msn:anzhengchao@msn.cn
Thank you!

English: Quick Adsense is an Ads management Wordpress plugin. It offers a quicker & flexible way to insert Adsense or any Ads code into a blog post. Besides, it can randomly place the Ads anywhere within a post. It comes with a simple setting page, and it does not overwhelm you with complicated customizable options.

In general, placing Adsense randomly within a post is a good way to experiment a variety of ads formats & placements besides optimizing your Adsense. If you have many regular visitors w
